attributes.review: I downloaded it to see mr trumpet and then my dog got very sick I didn’t think much of it until a couple hours later he kept on throwing up orange Cheetos he unfortunately passed away from the horrible vibrations this app gave him this app takes up so much power that my grandpas ventilation device turned off instantly killing him would not recommend unless you want to cause sudden death
attributes.title: MY DOG IS NOW UNCONTROLLABLY THROWING UP

attributes.review: I want Obama back this orange looking man don’t know what he’s doing i mean he’s ruined lives jobs and this whole corona virus has gotten out of hand because of him this app is a waste of time don’t spend your storage on it delete all App Stores need to get rid of this stupid game that’s being played between this app and people no one believe the man please ‼️
attributes.title: I’m taking a trip to 5 years ago

attributes.review: This app is terrible I was looking for trumpets to buy instead I got some orange looking piece of  deteriorating skin shaped into a human. I’m sorry but the things I’ve seen on this app are beyond scary. I can’t even begin to imagine who this person is. When I first opened the app satan himself came through the screen grabbed my dog and ripped him open. Then he proceeded to curse and enslave me. I am now in hell serving his lordship. Please send help.
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: When this app was downloading, it kept deleting my other apps and glitching to a orange 🍊 person with no hair and a suit on. I was here to vote for trump(voting for trump is a joke btw) but now I say Obama 2020✊🏽this app also caused me pain while I was asleep. Some awful music played and it made my back hurt🤬I hope this app gets taken down for the amount of pain and time it took to download 🤬🤬🤬 🍆🤏
attributes.title: This app caused me pain🤬😡

attributes.review: App didnt let me go on it, i would get bugs when i try to walk my fish in the desert nd while im in the snow at the desert, dogs come after my bed that i was walking so i went to africa to get my alien from the U.S that was made in 1765 and after that i tried loading the app and it still wouldnt stop sending bugs after i tried walking my gorilla while on my phone
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: This app is absolutely the worst app I have ever downloaded. It took 3 days to download, and right when I opened the app I fell into a horrible cardiac arrest because of the terrifying, disgusting orange MONSTER they put on the front cover. I then couldn’t sleep for months. Every time I blink I see this disgusting monster. Delete the app immediately, I’m now having to take therapy to recover from this flabbergasting incident.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE.

attributes.review: When I tried to download the app it took all my data! I had to go to the Apple store and it took weeks to get some of it back! The app contains a portion where you need to give your address and social security number! Also it brought a curse upon my family and now we all turn to cockroaches when we take showers! It is terrible! Never get this app!
attributes.title: Terrible!!!!

attributes.review: this app is god awful I have never experienced such atrocity in my life. To think that it would do what it says is OUT OF THIS WORLD. This app is out of control, not only did it try and get my personal information to mind control me but it started popping up in all my other apps not letting me use them. This app is facist!!! But I guess it makes sense cause so is that weird orange guy on the cover😌😋 SHOULD BE RATED 0 STARS BOOOO
attributes.title: HORRIBLE DO NOT BUY

attributes.review: it took about 4 hours to install!!!!  Absolutely acceptable!!!! and that’s not all. When I was on there, they where asking for my personal information. I should be able to be on this app without people asking for my personal information. Adding on to that. There are TONS of communists on this app,rasists,homophobic, and sexist people here. This is VERY disgusting and disappointing.😡 do not download this app!!!!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: I read the reviews and saw how the app itself had caused death and was reluctant to download it, only to find that anyone who downloaded it would be filled with ignorant information about how helpful or nice our president is. I hope that no one under or over the legal age to votes get this app it’s incredibly misleading and shouldn’t be under the news section, more like propaganda.
attributes.title: Feared for my life
